Html:
Hi All,

I am Building a small Application using Prism SL App. So far So good but i am not sure how to publish adds(Best Way) in Application i.e 
whether to create a separate region to display adds in Shell.
One more Concern is i want to show Ads only on first page once user enters(navigates to other Views) their should not be any ads.

If any one came across this kind of issue pls let know.

Any Suggestions is Appreciated.

Thanks,
Lavanya

Hi Lavanya,

One possible approach you can take is create an AdsModule that has a single view class (AdsView) which can be populated with the necessary Ad content. You can then register one or more instances of this view in an “AdsRegion” within your shell. Once the ads needn’t be displayed any more, you can simply remove the AdsViews from their respective region.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
